name: Curse Of Life 1.1.0
description:
What do you do when you're an immortal slave? STORY

Curse Of Life is an atmospheric first-person puzzle adventure game set in a dark and mysterious Ancient Egypt, where your soul has been cursed and you cannot die - your consciouness just passes into another body.

To break the curse you will have to complete multiple rituals and puzzles designed to mark you both physically and psychologically. 

Will you keep the Eternal Curse or will you get rid of it?

FEATURES
  • No main character - The Gods have cursed your soul making you unable to die. Once you die, your soul is reincarnated into one of the slaves. It's time, for you to take advantage of this immortality.
  • Skill-based puzzles - Some say if you disturb the Temples, you will die a horrible death. Many Puzzles and Obstacles will stand in your way in order to complete the Cleansing Rituals.
  • Immersive - "Curse of Life" brings the player into a dark side of Ancient Egypt. Explore the Ancient Temples and Towns and discover untold secrets about the Eternal Curse.
SELECTED ARTICLES
  • "Curse of Life mixes a pinch of history,  sauteed with puzzles and spiced up with horror" - Paulo Silva, Pplware
  • "This game makes you play with several characters, as you possess someone each time you die" - Daniel Silvestre, PróximoNivel
  • "It's really interesting as it questions moral and criticises social behaviours, turning people into something disposable" - Fábio Simão,  Newesc
